00029 // This factory method:
00030 //      initializes a SSContactInfoReviewer,
00031 //  shows user the info in a modal window to allow some changes,
00032 //  retrieves edited info from window and places into NSDictionary* info
00033 //  destroys the SSContactInfoReviewer
00034 //  returns the info
00035 
00036 + (NSDictionary*)infoWithDisplayText:(NSString*)displayText
00037                                  appsToReportVersion:(NSArray*)apps
00038                                    miscellaneousInfo:(NSDictionary*)miscellaneousInfo ;
00039 
00040         // display text is intro text to be shown to user.  Will not be further localized.
00041         // apps is a list of (string) app names whose version number will be included in info
00042         // miscellaneousInfo are strings of info to be shown to user and included in info.
00043         //    keys in miscellaneousInfo will be NSLocalized for showing to user
00044         //    keys in miscellaneousInfo will be translated accouring to TransmittedKeyForKey for transmitting
00045 
00046 
00047 @end
